about_the_game:
This DLC provides accommodate features like the ability to support multiprocessors, save/load program configuration and QHD/4K export to the original program CHAOS GAME.

Buying this DLC should give user a second launch option. Launch the app with the second launch option to enable the DLC.
detailed_description:
This DLC provides accommodate features like the ability to support multiprocessors, save/load program configuration and QHD/4K export to the original program CHAOS GAME.

Buying this DLC should give user a second launch option. Launch the app with the second launch option to enable the DLC.
name: CHAOS GAME - Accommodate Features

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 3000G / Intel Core i3-4150
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
